name: Master
description: Monks who have achieved perfect harmony between body and spirit, capable of extraordinary physical and spiritual feats beyond the capabilities of ordinary martial artists.

resource_systems.name: Ki
resource_systems.description: Inner spiritual energy that powers martial techniques and supernatural abilities
resource_systems.regeneration: 2 per 6 seconds, +2 per successful melee attack combo finisher
mechanics: Ki points are spent to activate special abilities and techniques
Some abilities require maintaining a ki flow, consuming points over time
Meditation stance increases ki regeneration rate by 400% but prevents movement
Masters can channel ki into elemental manifestations

resource_systems.name: Focus
resource_systems.description: Mental concentration that enhances precision and power of techniques
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds during combat, decays when out of combat
mechanics: Increases by 8 when landing attacks, 15 for critical hits
Decreases by 1 per second when not in combat
Higher Focus increases critical hit chance and damage of special techniques
At 100+ Focus, gain access to Transcendent techniques

resource_systems.name: Harmony
resource_systems.description: Balance between physical prowess and spiritual enlightenment
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds by alternating between offensive and defensive actions
mechanics: Increases by 10 when switching from attack to defense or vice versa
Higher Harmony increases all damage and damage reduction
At maximum Harmony, can enter Enlightened State for 30 seconds

class_mechanics.name: Advanced Martial Arts
class_mechanics.description: Mastery of unarmed combat that transcends normal physical limitations
effects: Unarmed attacks deal 2d8 base damage (increases with level)
Attack speed with unarmed strikes is 35% faster than standard weapons
Critical hits with unarmed attacks have a 40% chance to stun the target for 2 seconds
Can attack ethereal and incorporeal enemies with unarmed strikes

class_mechanics.name: Flowing Mastery
class_mechanics.description: Perfect control over combat flow and rhythm
effects: Each consecutive hit on the same target increases damage by 12%
After 3 consecutive hits, gain access to enhanced combo finishers
Combo counter resets after 5 seconds without landing an attack
Can maintain multiple combo chains against different targets simultaneously

class_mechanics.name: Spiritual Transcendence
class_mechanics.description: Elevated spiritual connection that grants supernatural abilities
effects: Can sense invisible or hidden enemies within 50 meters
Immune to fear, charm, and mind control effects
Can enter deep meditation to rapidly restore ki, health, and cleanse debuffs
Can project consciousness to scout areas within 100 meters

class_mechanics.name: Elemental Fist
class_mechanics.description: Channel elemental energies through martial techniques
effects: Can imbue attacks with fire, ice, lightning, or earth damage
Elemental attacks apply corresponding status effects
Can create elemental barriers for protection
Switching elements builds Harmony faster

skill_trees.name: Way of the Grandmaster
key_abilities: Perfect Strike: Guaranteed critical hit that ignores armor
Hundred Palm Technique: Unleash a flurry of 100 strikes in an instant
Touch of Death: Channel ki into a single deadly strike that can instantly kill weaker enemies

skill_trees.name: Way of the Ascendant
key_abilities: Astral Projection: Temporarily separate spirit from body to travel unhindered
Enlightened State: Enter a state of perfect harmony for enhanced abilities
Healing Touch: Channel ki to heal allies or cleanse corruption

skill_trees.name: Way of the Elements
key_abilities: Elemental Convergence: Combine multiple elements for devastating attacks
Dragon's Breath: Channel elemental ki into a powerful cone attack
Elemental Immunity: Temporarily become immune to a chosen element

advancement_requirements.skill_points: At least 5 points in any monk skill tree
challenges: Defeat the Monastery Guardian without taking damage

hero_classes.name: Enlightened Master
hero_classes.description: Monks who have achieved spiritual enlightenment and use their abilities to protect and guide others.

hero_classes.name: Iron Fist Master
hero_classes.description: Monks who have perfected the art of combat through discipline and training.

hero_classes.name: Way of Shadow
hero_classes.description: Monks who have turned their mastery of ki toward darker purposes, becoming deadly assassins.

legendary_items.name: Gloves of the Grandmaster
effects: Increases unarmed damage by 25%
Reduces ki cost of all abilities by 15%
Grants an additional combo finisher option

legendary_items.name: Sash of the Four Winds
effects: Increases movement speed by 20%
Grants immunity to movement-impairing effects
Allows short-range teleportation once per minute

lore: Masters are monks who have transcended the limitations of ordinary martial artists through years of rigorous training and spiritual discipline. They have achieved a perfect harmony between body and spirit, allowing them to perform feats that seem impossible to the uninitiated. Masters can channel their ki into elemental manifestations, move with supernatural speed, and strike with devastating precision. Some dedicate their abilities to protecting the innocent and spreading wisdom, while others focus solely on perfecting their combat techniques or even using their powers for darker purposes. Regardless of their path, all Masters command respect and awe from those who witness their extraordinary abilities.
